changeSet.author: Alex
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE hist_regions( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, )

changeSet.author: Theodora
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM hist_regions; INSERT INTO hist_regions (name) VALUES ('Bucovina'), ('Basarabia'), ('Moldova'), ('Dobrogea'), ('Muntenia'), ('Oltenia'), ('Banat'), ('Crisana'), ('Maramures'), ('Ardeal');
